PAD_GremishkaAllergyComment.synopsis: The player character comments on having caused a magic allergy reaction from a gremishka.
PAD_GremishkaAllergyComment.how_to_trigger: Go to 43; 24; 34 and trigger a fight the Gremishkas. Use a magic spell near them. The spell is going to trigger the nearby gremishkas' magic allergy feature, after which this PAD is played.

AD_GremishkaCry.synopsis: A mimicked baby crying sound made by a gremishka that the player can hear when approaching the library.

PAD_GremiskaCryReaction.synopsis: The character hears the cry of the gremishkas, and reacts to it, drawing more attention to it.
PAD_GremiskaCryReaction.how_to_trigger: Go to 57; 22; 27 in CRE_Main_A. The cry AD will play in the room near you, and the player character will respond with this PAD.

PAD_GremishkaRecognition.synopsis: The player encounters a living gremishka in a fight, this line playing on the first turn of combat following a successful check to identify it.
PAD_GremishkaRecognition.how_to_trigger: - Set Roll Amazing- Go to 42; 25; 35 in CRE_Main_A.- This should trigger combat with the Gremishkas. The skill check will be attempted on the first player turn. The PAD plays on a successful check.

PAD_GremishkaAllergyComment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_GremishkaAllergyComment_0.text: Looks like using magic around these things is more trouble than it's worth!

PAD_GremishkaRecognition_0.speaker: Player
PAD_GremishkaRecognition_0.text: Gremishkas? Better be careful with any magic - spells set them off.
